title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not.
EB: When selecting both P1 and P2, both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Navigator.
2. Select project P1.
3. Select project P2.
4. Observe that the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not.
